text: The Law of the Wilds is a 1915 American silent short drama film directed by Thomas Ricketts and starring Harry Van Meter, Reaves Eason, and Jack Richardson. ==Cast== * Harry Van Meter as Frank Storm * Reaves Eason as Steve Baker * Jack Richardson as Pete Lear * Perry Banks as Storekeeper * Emma Kluge as Storekeeper's Wife * Vivian Rich as Jennie * Arthur Millett as Sheriff * Louise Lester ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:1915 drama films Category:American drama films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1915 short films Category:American films
title: The Law of the Wilds
